short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces discord and GitHub emojis automagically in any editable field

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: **DISCLAIMER**: This extension was fully developed by --Explosion--. He asked me to publish the extension because he doesn't have the money to pay to put it up.
